message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTERNATEID_FV_ALTERNATEID_EMPTY
message.locale: Alternative ID must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_ALTID_STARTDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a from date for this alternative id.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTERNATIVEID_DRE_IDTYPE_MANY
message.locale: This alternative ID "%1s" already exists more than once for this type.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_DRE_PRIMARY
message.locale: This alternative ID is already used as a primary alternative ID for another client.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_ALTID_XRV_START_DATE
message.locale: The Alternate ID from date must be after "%1s" start date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_ALTID_XRV_END_DATE
message.locale: The Alternate ID to date must be before "%1s" end date - "%2d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTERNATIVEID_DRE_IDTYPE
message.locale: This alternative ID "%1s" already exists for this type.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_XRV_PRIMARYALTID_ACTIVE
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary alternative ID. Please create another alternative ID and assign it as the primary alternative ID before attempting to delete this alternative ID.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_XRV_PRIMARYALTIND_EMPTY
message.locale: You cannot modify the primary alternate ID so that it's no longer primary. Please select another alternate ID and make it the primary.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_XRV_TYPE_OVERLAP
message.locale: An alternate ID record must not overlap with an existing alternate ID record of the same type.
